name: Android App Prototype
desc: An App that I developed for a university project. This app was designed using Adobe XD and implemented using Angular and Ionic frameworks.

name: Portfolio Site
desc: Using Adobe XD to mockup a rapid prototype for this portfolio website. Vanilla HTML, CSS used and created by myself. NodeJS and Express for backend.

name: 3D Book
desc: A book desgined to teach young students the modelling program 123D Design. This was a part of a High School Project. Adobe InDesign, Word, Illustrator

name: Charity Motion Graphic
desc: A motion graphic video designed with Adobe After Effects for a charity organisation. All assets and animation were made by myself

name: Human Site
desc: An interactive website for a university project. One of my first websites. HTML, CSS was used with a combination of jQuery for interactive elements.

name: Massage Remake
desc: An interactive website for a university project. One of my first websites. HTML, CSS was used with a combination of jQuery for interactive elements.

name: Chamber of Commerence Logo
desc: I entered into a logo competition while at school to design the new chamber of commerence logo for my local concil. I won the contest and the logo is being used in practice today.

name: Mobile Game Prototype
desc: I created a mobile application using the software 'Game Maker'. I designed all the artwork for the game as well as wrote original code. This game can be downloaded via contacting me

name: Charity Walk Bib
desc: I designed the Blue Mountains Grammar School bibs for a charity walk. I used Adobe InDesign and printing skills to create the bibs for walkers.

name: Kebabzilla Mockup Website
desc: I designed a mockup website using Figma to practice my skills and further develop them.

name: Lush Cosmetics EDM
desc: I prototyped a EDM for lush on mobile and tablet.
